# wormly_global_alerts_mute (Resource)

Wormly global alerts mute resource. Controls the global alert mute setting.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether global alerts mute is enabled

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (always 'global_alerts_mute')
